content.detailedDescription: On either october 16th or december 18th of 1994 at approximately 6:45am  i was flying commercial from edmonton to san diego california. i had flown the same route three times that year, but i believe it was during the december trip that i saw an undulating mist, or what appeared to be thick black smoke hovering outside my window far off in the distance. alarmed, i looked around me to see if anyone on my side of the plane was looking out the window, but most passengers appeared to be asleep. i first thought something big might be burning on the ground below the plane, but then  realized we were too high (2300 ft. above ground) to see a ground fire. i was shocked to see this mist tightening up and becoming a shape like a walnut, getting more opaque by the second. i looked over at the man next to me who also was looking past me out the window, and i asked him if he was seeing what i was seeing. he said "yes" just as the dark walnut shape seemed to bleed down two long dark, misty" arms" which started to form into a small very dark little saucer shaped craft below the walnut shaped mass. i still asked the man next to me if he was seeing what i was seeing as i quickly started sketching the shapes in my notebook. he said he was seeing a shape forming from the larger shape above it, and we both watched as the larger walnut shape slowly appeared to melt away while the smaller craft formed into the saucer shape, then formed a tail like a plane, and suddenly zipped off so fast it left our viewing sight. i asked the man beside me to describe what he thought it was. he told me it looked like a saucer, then a silhouette of a plane before flying off. i showed him my drawings and he told me that he worked for a big defense company, and stated "i know what military craft looks like, and that was nothing i've ever seen before...That was no weather balloon mam". he told me to keep my drawings and gave me his business card, which i have since lost. i did speak with the pilots when i was leaving the plane. i asked 2 of them if they happened to see a black cloud that formed into a "shape" out of the right side of the plane when we were close to crossing over the us from canada. they looked at each other and said no. i told them i drew what i saw and they both asked to see my drawings. they appeared very interested, but they were not saying if they saw anything.
content.summary: Ufo dark mist formed into a solid round shape, then dropped into another ufo that slowly formed below it from 2 misty tenticles, then a shape formed from it like a solid ship or plane which hovered before is shot off to the north.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck. i was looking at the stars and saw one that seemed closer and noticed it was moving. took out my phone and taped it. i knew it was probably a ufo, it was like a fireball. an airplane flew into its path towards philly, and it ascended out of my view. went back to look at the video and took a ton of zoomed in photos of the ufo. changed many colors every second and also duplicated in acouple of the seconds and you can see that their may actually be two.
content.summary: Was on my deck ,video taped ufo

content.detailedDescription: To whom it may concern: i was standing just outside hancock airport and near a toyota dealership and sign when i observed something i thought was unusual in the sky. i happened to take a picture with 4 military thunderbirds flying in formation past me heading north perhaps circling around the airport at the time. the object seemed to have an unusual shape and i could not identify it even almost 20 years later. this was the same day that an f-117 flew at the syracuse airport, went to maryland and crashed. i also have a picture of that plane as it was circling around hancock to leave for maryland. i have what i believe is the original negative, camera specs, 4 x 6 photo, with several 8 x 10 enlargements and a thank you letter from a military source. i  merely considered myself lucky if i could get the unknown object with the 4 planes in the same photo which i did. i lost sight of the object after i took the picture. the number of witnesses could be several if the pilots of the 4 thunderbirds are counted also. maybe even the airport control tower or radar people from the airport could be considered as well.
content.summary: Object seen was photographed with 4 military aircraft in same picture, and was also sent to langley afb.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard and decided to take a picture of the moon on my cellphone right before midnight.
as i snapped a shot i saw an orb like object just below the moon.
i took another couple of pictures as the object descended vertically and disappeared.
video taken but object never showed up again.  vertical drop makes me unsure of what i witnessed!  i only know i had never seen a single orb like light not visible to the eye on camera and drop as i kept taking photos.
content.summary: While taking a photo of the moon from backyard on camera i noted a fixed orb like object under the moon. it moved vertically and disappeared. probably a plane but never saw one doing this before.  air force base and airport close by. unseen by naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to let dog use bathroom. looked up into northeastern sky. 2 huge beams of light shot across the sky, paralleling each other. then it happened again. all within 5 seconds of each other. twin, brilliant 
blue green "laserlike" beams. more green than blue. they had to be huge. the sky lit up around them. they reminded me of the old star trek show when ship fired weapons. it was astounding. pulse lasted only a  part of a second then a pause then pulsed again. this was not lightening or aircraft or a searchlight. it was stunning. even the clouds lit up. i am a skeptic and assume this was some experiment or something, but if so, it is huge and cost us taxpayers alot of money....I simply cannot get it out of my mind...
content.summary: Twin huge "laser like" blue green pulses across entire field of view

content.detailedDescription: I was investigating storm drain locations for a drainage study i was doing for work when i found this object in the sky while scrolling through the google earth street view. you can find the object in google earth by going to the cul-de-sac (end) of wolverton road in baltimore county, maryland 21234 and zooming down to street view. slowly scrolling out of the cul-de-sac you will see the object in the sky for one frame. scrolling one frame forward or backward from the object frame and the object disappears. it looks like a disc shaped object.
content.summary: Disc like object in sky found on google earth street view.

content.detailedDescription: On june 16, 2016 i was taking a break from mowing and sat in a chair in my driveway (which faces approx. 250 degrees sw) when i observer a white round object at about 240 degrees sw and about 70-75 degrees elevation ( i have a compass ap on my cell phone)what caught my attention was that it was not moving at all. at first i thought it was a weather ballon but i did not see any kind of trailing material. there were high thin clouds ( see photos ) out that day but the object was plainly visible i watch for about 15 minutes and it still did not appear to move. i keep a pair of binoculars in my pu truck so i got them and tried to seethe object more clearly. i was not able to steady these binoculars so i went into the house and got another pair (i like to bird watch so i have lots of binoculars) this did not work to my satisfaction (again not able to hold steady enough to improve my visibility) i then got out my sony a77 digital camera that is fitted with a sony 2.8/16-50 ssm lens. i also used a sony 4.5-5.6/75-300 telephoto lens. i took a few pictures with the 2.8 lens and then installed the telephoto lens and a quantaray 2x teleconverter. i then took more photos but was having difficulty focusing the lens i then tried to focus on trees and other objects closer by to see if i could the maximum distance focus function to work i took 4 or five pictures and did not realize that when i used the zoom in feature on the camera i had a reasonably clear picture of the object hat appeared to be the shape of a blood cell in white and it appeared to have numerous windows around the periphery of the disc. i attempted to repeat the focus adjustment. at this point around 10:30 am the clouds increased (although not significantly)and i was no longer able to see the object. i thought about getting my tripod to help steady the camera, but after waiting another 15 minutes or so the object was no longer visible even though the clouds had dissipated. so that is what happened. i watch the local news and scanned the newspaper for a couple of days afterwards but saw no mention of anyone seeing this object.
content.summary: High altitude white roundish non moving object

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:15 pm and i was talking on the phone and laying in the bed of a truck looking up. at first i assumed it was a star, then i noticed it heading south and thought it was a satellite/iss, but it started meandering around, stopping and going, hovering, and moving higher and lower. it was one of the most amazing things i've ever seen. this occurred for about an hour and a half until i honestly got bored with it and went inside
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft was white and star-like meandering around

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving south bound on sr 28 out of wenatchee near rock island when i observed a chrome object the size of quarter about 50 degrees off horizon in sky.  the sky was blue and free of clouds.  the object was disc like in appearance and hovered for about a minute then moved slightly west bound.  no vapor trails was seen, and i thought it was a plane at first.  but it was highly chrome like in appearance with a dark black spot on bottom.  it was the oddest thing i have ever sern. i was driving at the time and wanted to pull over to get a picture, however traffic was heavy.   then as i drove closer to rock island heading towards the dam, it started to fade out because it was increasing altitude.  it appeared as a bright star for 10 or 15 seconds and disappeared.  as i passed rock island dam and started to assend towards quincy i observed a jet with vapor trails heading south bound around same place object was located.  a typical jet or commercial airliner. i have no idea what the object was.  i pondered for next 30 minutes trying to explain it.  i have seen alot of planes, helicopters, etc in the air.  this object was like nothing i ever seen before.  and was so reflective it was truely nothing i ever obsered before.
dominic mason
content.summary: Witnessed chrome disc object hovering over rock island then increased altitude in air until it faded to star-like then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was outside smoking.
2. a silent big moving object at the sky while looking at the stars
3. i just didn't know, it was too big.
4. it was a big weird shaped object silently moving across the sky.
5. it was just a weird flying object, i took a picture to find out what it could be.
6. it moved further away until it was covered from some trees.
content.summary: Weird shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog like i do every evening and it was a clear night i noticed this round sphere of light in the sky and it flew across the night sky something that happens most nights but what made this different is that it dropped straight down which i thought was unusual it probably can be explained but i thought i should report it.
content.summary: I saw a round light flying across the night sky then dropped straight down out of my line of sight.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were heading south when we noticed the lights in the sky. i've lived in this area for over 15 years and have never seen anything like it. the 3 lights began to disappear one after another.. repeated, then did it again until each dissapeared and didn't come back. ⚪⚪⚪,  ⚪⚪,   ⚪, ⚪⚪,⚪⚪⚪, ⚪⚪,  ⚪, ⚪⚪,⚪⚪⚪, ⚪⚪,  ⚪,
content.summary: 3 lights.. one turned off after another like a pattern before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Hi i have found something new in the apollo 8 photos of the moon in the pictures that the apollo 8 took there is a set of photos showing what looks like smoke coming up out of a pipe or what looks like a pipe in the keplor crater ive found a ufo being shot out or launched out of the same pipe when the smoke comes out i didnt know who else to show this to so please contact me thank you
content.summary: Ufo being shot out of the moon

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Walking to my car in the evening to go to the store. i turned and looked over my house and saw 2 slow moving, low altitude craft. it was dark so i have no specifics other that they were both redish orange in color, pulsating, slow moving. very bright, like 2 fireballs in the sky. making no noise. i went back in my house to get my family. my daughter filmed these on her phone until both disappeared, possibly in to cloud cover.
content.summary: 2 bright reddish/orange fireballs

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from dinner in bedford, nh. was in passenger seat of car looking at the sky. saw unusual triangle made of three points of light while entering on ramp of 293. took picture and saw that multiple lights made up each star like point, with the one on top looking like a purple trail.  lights did not move. lost track of them with clouds and trees.
content.summary: Saw triangle of star like shapes stationary in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was with 2 friends of mine and we were driving back from san francisco after a concert on highway 101. as we were driving it was about 12:15 when i noticed two strange lights in the sky, we were passed sfo airport but these lights did not have green or red lights signaling where they were going. they were bright orange orbs, as i pointed it out, one disappeared. afterwards i started recording and will include the video files. the one light that remained stayed stationary for a bit in the sky only to dim out and appear again across the road this time brighter and lighting up the sky and the clouds behind it. it would dim out again but the bright aura still could be seen through the clouds. next what happened after i stopped recording, i saw the ship behind me about maybe 300ft hovering in the air over a building. it was rectangle in shape and had red and orange-yellow glowing lights underneath and strange markings live i've never seen before. the ship was at least 30 feet, maybe bigger. one of my friends saw the ship as well and described it like i just did in the same way. i'm certain we both saw it. i felt like i was being watched, it knew that i knew that there was something strange going on and it felt like someone was staring through my mind. after the ship appeared behind us it quickly teleported again or moved really fast but after that it wasn't seen again. i think it was observing the meteor shower that was happening a few days ago and it noticed that my emotional levels were spiking because of witnessing a ufo. it wasn't there for long but my friends and all saw it and can agree that it was an ufo. i've reached out to many sites but everyone just ignores what i say or thinks i'm lying but this all happened in front of me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: There was two lights but one quickly disappeared the other got brighter and teleported behind us

content.detailedDescription:
upon awaking this am i noticed circular doughnut shaped mark in freshly mowed grass with all of the grass bent in a westerly direction. the grass in the outer circle was completely clean of any clipping. the clippings on the east side of the circle were in a ridge along the outer perimeter of the inner circle. the clippings on the western side of the circle were in  a ridge to the outermost area of the circle. the grass that formed the ridges was brown in color wail the rest of the grass in the area was a dry green as you would expect freshly mowed clippings to look like. the grass in the middle was undisturbed as and the clippings were still were the mower had discharged them. there is a 1 inch diameter puncture in the ground on the east side of the circle 5 inches outside the perimeter. within the undisturbed center there is a rectangle depression where the grass has been flattened.

outside the circle and about 4 feet away there is a metal gear and plastic housing on the ground. these components were dislodged from the underground sprinkler system.  

other than our foot prints leading up the the area there is no disturbances in the grass. no tracks leading to or leading away.

at aprox. 1:15 in the am of the 15th our shepard wined and woke us up. my wife got up with her then came back to bed.
content.summary: Circular doughnut shaped pattern in grass, laying down in same direction, area around undisturbed no tracks in grass freshly mowed. clearly something landed and flew away.

content.detailedDescription:
Went to my back yard to watch the meteor showers (from the various news sources)on august 12, 2016. turned off all lights to reduce pollution and enjoyed the "show". then, on august 14, 2016, around 3:16, went out to the front yard to see if there was any meteor activity. that's when we saw the first one. it was brighter than most anything else in the night sky. my friend thought it was a drone. it didn't look like any drone i'd ever seen before (and i've seen plenty) so i went to my back yard (all lights were turned off earlier)and noticed that there were many orbs in all directions. it was a clear night and all of the stars, planets, etc. looked normal. very for off, we could see, here and there, what appeared to be airplanes with normal lights. i used to fly a little (172s, cherokees, sierras and a cessna 410 once!)but i could not determine the altitudes with any certainty. i set up my spotting scope and zoomed all the way out. they were orbs all right. we couldn't tell that with the naked eye but you sure could with the scope (60 power?). there wasn't much movement and none joined others or flew in formation. they just kind of hovered, pulsating white to orange/red (thought i might have seen blue or green once in a while too)almost like an energy source of some kind inside of a membrane or translucent shell. after a while i went to bed thinking that there had to be a logical explanation. atmospheric conditions causing normal stars to appear????? yeah, whatever...
so, here i am searching the web to see if anyone else ever saw anything like this because i never have and bam! then i came across your page. there is so much bs on the web. i'm not sure what to believe. convince me.
oh, and nasa's explanation was a good one! lol check it out! lyall
content.summary: First saw one then turned off all lights in and around my house, went to my back yard and scanned the rest of the sky. that's when we discovered that there were many in every direction! amazing!

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was about 20 min. after midnight. i was in my vehicle. moon roof open. i heard a very loud high pitched and continuous sound. i believe like breaking sound waves. above the treetops hovering was this huge craft. it ascended and descended coming back just above the trees. each time it went up i didn't hear that sound until it got close again. the light when on, as they alternated bluish green....A really pretty color. there was a red light that was visible at times in the center. i took these pics with my night vision app. the entire time was between 30 to 45 minutes. no cars went by and it was virtually me and that.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was in my vehicle. i heard a very loud sound to look up & see it. it was hovering above the trees next to my home. blue/gr  lights...Up...Back dow...Hover .Red light center sound intensified with closeness.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to a friend's bbq with my husband.  i usually take pictures while he drives this is something i always do. that day i was trying to get a picture of two buildings very famous in mississauga and almost missed because at that point we were turning; so i attempted to take the picture but wasn't happy; anyways two days later i was checking my photos and when i opened i noticed this object on the corner;  to me when i zoom the picture looks like an non identity object.
content.summary: I took a picture an something in the corner appears an object looks like an oval

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i just got back from shopping from santa fe nm and had arrived at her home in espanola nm. she went ahead of me and i lingered behind to admire the sunset. i looked up and saw a weird round gray object from a distance, moving downward to the left reappearing and disappearing.I thought maybe it could be a plane, but planes don't reappear and disappear...And are not round that i have seen. quickly i grabbed my phone and snapped some pictures hoping what i saw showed up.Through vision it disappeared. sadly i wished i recorded it..But was afraid it would vanish before i got to recording it.I saw this object with such excitement and wonder...What could make it propulse like that with no contrail?
content.summary: I looked to the sunset, noticed a circular object moving downward to the left. reappearing and disappearing lasted about 45 secounds.

content.detailedDescription: On july 31st, i was taking pictures of the sunset. right after i've noticed behind me when i turned these 2 objects moving without making a sound, no trail behind them like a jet. they were moving fast. i took of few pictures. these objects were moving at the same speed and about 2 miles apart and kept that distance until disappearing behind the mountain. my car starter stopped working. i could not unlock my car with the remote, then it started working well the 2 days after. my cell phone was still working.
content.summary: Right at sunset, was taking pics of sunset

content.detailedDescription: Traveling north on greenville  ( tx-hy 5 ) in allen tx.  noticed a single, smallish cloud in the sky(from my best judgment 25-50 yds. wide x 20-30'tall). approx 10 deg. elev. 020 mag hdg. and with no other clouds visible. that seemed a little odd, but i did not give it much thought. when i was approx. 500 yds. from turning onto a side street, i noticed the lone cloud brighten up then a very pronounced flash. it was like a lightning dis-charge that one normally sees, but there was absolutely no other clouds  and it did not emit a "bolt" of lightning. nor did the cloud seem to be a large enough  to generate such a bright charge like what i saw. in addition, i have never seen any cloud in solitude flash in the sky. as an aviation "junkie" i tend to look at the sky often and i can usually tell what is what in my area. as well, i am familiar with the  (star's)and (sid's) that the commercial/civilian aircraft use in this region for the love field and dfw airports. i immediately knew it was not aircraft/helicopters so this leaves few options. i only saw one flash and it happened quickly, but i did keep sight of the cloud during my turn and onto the side street until i lost view due to trees.  the cloud itself did not seem to have any unusual features other than the left and right sides were symmetrical. three "humps " upward with the center hump being slightly higher than the two outer "humps". the bottom was typical flat.
content.summary: Single cumulus cloud on very clear night flashed brightly  with no possible es charging/discharge.

content.detailedDescription: We were at a camp ground near pa/oh border. large cell was coming in about hour before sun set. it was massive storm so we were watching it form our camper. then my sister mother and i all saw the same thing a shiny object moving fast along the horizon parallel with the lake, we all ran down to the water front to get a better view and the first object abruptly shot up at a 45deg angle (i though a wow water are we witnessing) we all stared in amazement. the first one as fast as it went up came back down to hovering above the lake surface and a second one appeared out of nowhere (possibly from under water)? they both kept moving west and then vanished.
content.summary: Two bright objects appeared moving fast west over lake erie, 1 flew up and back down

content.detailedDescription: Observed 5 orbs, initial 3 appeared one at a time and disappeared into the distance. the last 2 were side-by-side and came together before disappearing
content.summary: Observed 5 orbs

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking my dog down around birch bay i was seeing  something close to surface of water. the object was like  skipping on the water  like a stone as it crossed the bay. it was no more than 200 to 300 feet from me. as it crossed in front of me i thought i saw someone sitting in it driving it like a car. i was so amazed that i stood there dumbfounded as it passed me. i am thinking it was 7 to 10 feet or more in diameter. i thought it was water craft of some kind until it shot up into the air very quickly and out of sight.
content.summary: White sphere skiping across the water in bay then going straight in air

content.detailedDescription: I had submitted this about a year ago and you attempted to contact me.  for some reason i was so paranoid i did not reply, can't say why but just a feeling.  anyway i am ready to go forward.  i observed a triangle shaped ufo when i was living in tucson az in 1998 around august at 2 am in the morning.  i just could not sleep and went outside to my patio to have a drink and just look at the night sky.  i lived in an area outside of tucson in an area called rita ranch.  the sky is always crystal clear and the stars are just so bright!  as i was looking out to the west i just had a feeling there was something above me.  i looked up and all i saw was black, which was strange because i should have seen stars!  i kept looking and i heard a very distinct humming/pulsing noise.  i kept looking and then noticed that the black was moving.  i saw that it was a triangle shape, it had large white circles on each point of the triangle and large red circle in the center that pulsed.  i started looking round the neighborhood to see if any neighbors were up, and of course they were not.  i just kept watching as it moved very slowly overhead and it took a good 5 minutes to where i could see stars where it used to be.  then all of a sudden it just took off, not going up but just in a straight line and was gone in the blink of the eye.  i kept standing there thinking i must be really tired and i was just seeing things.  then  3 a10 warthogs came screaming overhead.  the air force base is close to my house and a10's are seen a lot so we are all accustomed to them.  however i had never seen any of them late at night.  the next day i heard that several people at work had seen the ufo as well. i was not able to take a picture but i am attaching a jpeg of the exact thing that i saw.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
my husband was driving, my daughter was in front seat with him and i was in the backseat. we were in our driveway, had just come home from dairy queen. i looked out the window into the field coming up the driveway in our house, spotted a bright orange floating light  in the shape of an orb.  it looked like a ball of fire.   my daughter and husband spotted it and we stopped. it did not move but there was a tree blocking our view some want so my husband backed up and stopped. we watched it for about a minute and then it started blinking and then it just blinked itself off. like someone turning off the light switch it was gone.   i am a private pilot,  so i am familiar with most aircraft and required faa lights.  at first i thought it could be one of those chinese lanterns but it never descended or went any direction.  i want to say that i have seen this same thing several times.  this one was not as close or maybe it wasn't as big. it is very fascinating and whatever it is makes you feel calm and not afraid at all. i was at the airport two weeks before,  a round 10:30 pm. we were hanging out at my dads hanger talking and noticed one of these lights at the east end of the runway.  i thought it was another aircraft coming in with the landing light but then i noticed how orange the light was and not white like most landing lights. i told everyone to be alert as an airplane was coming in, but as we all stood and watched the light, it never descended, it just hovered and did the same thing as this other light, it just blanked out. i want to add that they are round looking fireballs, or that they are rounds fears with some form of energy or lights that make them look like they are on fire.
 on fourth of july, we saw another light like this but i also wrote it off at the chinese lantern because it was fourth of july. it was 3 am and we were leaving early for the airport in jonesboro, ar go to chicago for the week. now that i think back, i'm not so sure it was a chinese lantern at all. i am not the only one that keeps seeing these orange lights.  some years ago, i think it was in 2011 on new year's eve that i reported seeing 8 to 10 of these lights and watching them for well over 10 minutes. i know this sounds crazy, but i do believe they are angelic beings of light and not craft. you may contact me for full explanation.  i am always in a group of people, most with my family, and no one ever feels fearful when seeing them. i feel like they are starting to be around a lot now. when i first started seeing them back in 2011, i thought maybe they were afterburn from some kind of moa activity  from why did air force base. my house is under and moa  if you will look on a aerial map.  in 2011 we saw those bunch and i was guessing 8 to 10 of them, a couple of them were dropping out white light, and the only way i could describe it was like fairy dust falling out of them.  several people in our town saw these orange fireballs or ufos so i know i am not crazy, but it is taken me several years to come to that conclusion. i see other people report them on twitter and get pictures of them or video on youtube.   i have studied them for a few years now and still quite curious, but i do believe they are a benevolent or they would have done something by now.  i seem to have become quite intuitive since i have been seeing them for several years now. i know it sounds crazy but i can't help but wonder if it is because i have seen them so many times.  i have no pictures or videos as it seems when we see them, i am just mesmerized is to watch them and forget to take picture or video.
content.summary: hovering in sky then it just disappeared like it  started to turn off it's light  blinking or blink out

content.detailedDescription: Estaba buscando en google earth el lugar por donde cruza la balsa el río gualeguay cerca de la ciudad de villaguay, cuando observé estas marcas sobre el terreno, en una zona propensa a inundaciones. no sé que pueda ser. lo que me resulta curioso es la geometría de triángulos unidos por sus vértices y la dimensión que tiene (280m).
content.summary: Marca sobre terreno

content.detailedDescription:
It was the other night, when having a bbq with a cople at my house at night, we were talking outside the house and when the couple went into the house, my girlfriend and i noticed a bright star northeast about 50 degrees. 
as we noticed the star, we both said/mentioned look at that bright star in the sky. it wasn't there a few minutes ago i said. when at the same time, the orb/star like object glowed and was even shinier and then within two seconds, it got dimmer and then just dissapeared! this is when i estimated that it would have been aprox10 km or aproximately 6miles away. the object must have  been over the sea. i live beside the beach but i couldnt get to the sea and could not see if there was a reflection. it looked like a star but when it got brighter this is when i thought it must be nearer then what i first thought. i cannot edtimate the size as it was glowing constantly but ot must have been larger than a airbus (jumbo jet). i look at stars every night and can spot different kinds of aeroplanes. this was not one. not a satellite or anything i have ever seen in the sky. a great experience and hope to see more!!!
content.summary: Light orb looked like a star dissapeard
